story.name: Star Voyage
story.generationPrompt: This is a Sci-fi novel. The setting is space-ship, the main problem of the plot is aliens board the ship, and the goal is stop the aliens. The theme is Mercy, it should shine in the plot. The story should be Life-like in its grimness/darkness. Is there romance in the story=True. Extra details: the attacking aliens, sariels, want to overtake the spaceship. The player should be able to choose to grant them mercy IF THE PLAYER WINS. There is also the possibility the aliens do overtake the ship.

player.name: James
player.generationPrompt: Male Young Adult Captain. Square face. Short Blonde Straight hair. Blue Round eyes. Same as hair color Rounded Normal eyebrows. Straight nose, Full lips, Light skin. Average height, Fit weight. Lean. Wears a gold colored uniform. Is the captain of the ship. A portrait of this character from shoulders up. Black only background. No repetitive heads. There should be only one single head! Character is from a Sci-fi novel. Grimness/darkness of the novel is Life-like. The art sytle is Animation. The setting of the novel is in space-ship, the main problem of the plot is aliens board the ship, and the goal is stop the aliens.

NPCs.name: Spack

Wears a blue uniform. Ears are pointy.. Personality: Stoic and very logical. Extremely loyal to James Is this character a romance interest for the player: True.
